Property.Name: BodyScript
BodyScript
Property.Value: BEGIN SELECT * FROM Actor a, Film f, FilmActor fa WHERE a.ActorId = fa.ActorId AND f.FilmId = fa.FilmId AND f.Title = @title END

Property.Name: BodyScript
Property.Value: BEGIN SELECT*FROM Actor WHERE LastName like @LastL + '%' END

Property.Name: BodyScript
Property.Value: BEGIN SELECT *FROM Actor WHERE LEFT (FirstName,1) = @initialF AND LEFT (LastName,1) = @initialL END

Property.Name: BodyScript
Property.Value: SELECT ActorId, UPPER(LEFT(LastName, 1)) as LastName, FirstName FROM Actor; RETURN 0

Property.Name: BodyScript
BodyScript
Property.Value: SELECT * FROM Category WHERE CategoryId = @Id; RETURN 0

Property.Name: BodyScript
Property.Value: BEGIN SELECT * FROM Film f, Actor a, FilmActor fa where a.ActorId = fa.ActorId AND f.FilmId = fa.FilmId AND a.LastName = @LastName; END

Property.Name: BodyScript
Property.Value: BEGIN SELECT * FROM Film f, Category c, FilmCategory fc WHERE f.FilmId = fc.FilmId AND c.CategoryId = fc.CategoryId AND c.[Name] = @Name; END

Property.Name: BodyScript
Property.Value: BEGIN SELECT*FROM Film WHERE FilmId = @Id; END

Property.Name: BodyScript
Property.Value: SELECT * FROM Film f JOIN FilmCategory fc ON f.FilmId = fc.FilmId WHERE fc.CategoryId = @CategoryId; RETURN 0

Property.Name: BodyScript
BodyScript
Property.Value: SELECT * FROM Film WHERE [Description] like '%' + @KeyWord + '%'; RETURN 0

Property.Name: BodyScript
Property.Value: BEGIN SELECT * FROM Film f, [Language] l WHERE f.LanguageId = l.LanguageId AND l.[Name] = @Language; END

Property.Name: BodyScript
Property.Value: SELECT * FROM Film f, Actor a, FilmActor fa where a.ActorId = fa.ActorId AND f.FilmId = fa.FilmId AND a.ActorId = @ActorId; RETURN 0

Property.Name: BodyScript
BodyScript
HeaderContents
QueryScript
Property.Value: SELECT [FilmId] ,[Title] ,[Description] ,[ReleaseYear] ,[F].[LanguageId] ,[L].[Name] ,[RentalDuration] ,[RentalPrice] ,[Length] ,[ReplacementCost] ,[F].[RatingId] ,[Rating] FROM [Film] AS [F] JOIN [Rating] AS [R] ON [F].[RatingId] = [R].[RatingId] JOIN [Language] AS [L] ON [F].[LanguageId] = [L].[LanguageId]
